name: Confined Space (Takametaka)
description:
Confined Space Description

In the year 277X, space is rare. You managed to get a piece of it for a good price but that was only the beginning of your troubles.

This game was made in 10 days during the EGC 2020 Game Jam. It is my first ever game created and it was made in Unity.

How to play
  • ZQSD to move,
  • Mouse to shoot,
  • Bullet will bounce forever,
  • If you hit one of your own bullet it will hurt you,
  • Leaderboard sorted by Score, then by Time.
Assets

Player ship, Ennemi ship, and Asteroid, are assets from Kenney's Game Assets.

The fonts used are Avayx (for the title and buttons) and SpaceMono (both free to use).

As for the small music, it was made by me during the last day of the Jam.
